snippet: A young camel presented to President François Hollande in thanks for France’s intervention in Mali fell victim to a misunderstanding, and then the butcher’s knife.
abstract: Young camel presented to Pres Francois Hollande in thanks for France’s intervention in Mali is slaughtered and eaten by Malian family assigned to care for it when family misunderstands purpose of custody arrangement; Malian authorities say they will give Hollande new camel.
lead_paragraph: A young camel presented to President François Hollande in thanks for France’s intervention in Mali fell victim to a misunderstanding, and then the butcher’s knife.

headline.seo: Hollande’s Camel, a Gift From Mali, Becomes Tagine
headline.main: Hollande Finds His Gift Camel Was Consumed
headline.print_headline: Hollande Finds His Gift Camel Was Consumed
